block-definition.comment: Takes a text string as input, and reports a new text string containing all but the first character of the input.
block-definition.translations: pt:_ sem o primeiro caractere ca:_ sense la primera lletra

custom-block.l: All but first of empty word.

block-definition.comment: Takes a text string as input, divides it into words treating one or more spaces as a word separator (only spaces count; punctuation is part of the word) and reports a text string containing all but the first word, with one space between words and no spaces at the beginning or end. (Note: consider using SENTENCE➞LIST and processing the resulting list instead of doing recursion on sentences in text string form. List operations are faster.)
block-definition.translations: pt:_ sem a primeira palavra ca:_ sense la primera paraula

custom-block.l: All but first of empty sentence.
All but first of empty sentence.

block-definition.comment: Takes a text string as input, and reports a new text string containing all but the last letter of the input.
block-definition.translations: pt:_ sem o último caractere ca:_ sense la darrera lletra

custom-block.l: All but first of empty word.

block-definition.comment: Takes a text string as input, divides it into words treating one or more spaces as a word separator (only spaces count; punctuation is part of the word) and reports a text string containing all but the last word, with one space between words and no spaces at the beginning or end. (Note: consider using SENTENCE->LIST and processing the resulting list instead of doing recursion on sentences in text string form. List operations are faster.)
block-definition.translations: pt:_ sem a última palavra ca:_ sense la darrera paraula

custom-block.l: All but last of empty sentence.
All but last of empty sentence.

block-definition.comment: Takes a text string as input, divides it into words treating one or more spaces as a word separator (only spaces count; punctuation is part of the word) and reports a text string containing only the first word, with no spaces before or after it.
block-definition.translations: pt:a primeira palavra de _ ca:primera paraula de _

block-definition.comment: Takes a text string as input, and reports the last character in the string.
block-definition.translations: pt:o último caractere de _ ca:primera lletra de _

block-definition.comment: Takes a text string as input, divides it into words treating one or more spaces as a word separator (only spaces count; punctuation is part of the word) and reports a text string containing only the last word of the input, with no spaces before or after it.
block-definition.translations: pt:a última palavra de _ ca:darrera paraula de _

block-definition.comment: Takes a text string as input, and reports TRUE if the string has no characters in it of any kind, otherwise false.
block-definition.translations: pt:a palavra _ está vazia ca:paraula buida? _

block-definition.comment: Takes a text string as input, and reports TRUE if the input contains no characters other than spaces (therefore, no words when the string is considered as a sentence), otherwise FALSE.
block-definition.translations: pt:a frase _ está vazia ca:frase buida? _

block-definition.comment: Like JOIN, takes any number of words (text strings) and reports a sentence with its inputs concatenated, but inserts a blank space between the inputs. Consider using SENTENCE (Lists palette) instead.
block-definition.translations: de:füge Wörter zusammen _ ca:uneix les paraules _ es:unir las palabras _ fr:fusionne les mots _ pt:uma frase com as palavras _

block-definition.comment: Takes a sentence in list form and reports the sentence as a text string.
block-definition.translations: de:Liste $arrowRight Satz _ ca:llista $arrowRight frase _ es:lista $arrowRight frase _ fr:liste $arrowRight phrase _ pt:uma frase com as palavras em _

block-definition.comment: Takes a sentence in text string form and reports the sentence as a list of its words.
block-definition.translations: de:Satz $arrowRight Liste _ ca:frase $arrowRight llista _ es:frase $arrowRight lista _ fr:phrase $arrowRight liste _ pt:uma lista com as palavras da frase _

block-definition.comment: report a list in which each item is one letter from the input word
block-definition.translations: de:Wort $arrowRight Liste _ ca:paraula $arrowRight llista _ es:palabra $arrowRight lista _ fr:mot $arrowRight liste _ pt:uma lista com os caracteres da palavra _

block-definition.comment: join all the items of the input list into a single word, and report it
block-definition.translations: de:Liste $arrowRight Wort _ ca:llista $arrowRight paraula _ es:lista $arrowRight palabra _ fr:liste $arrowRight mot _ pt:uma palavra com os caracteres em _

block-definition.comment: SENTENCE is the main constructor for sentences, represented as lists of words. It takes zero or more inputs, each of which can be either a list or a text string. If a list, the input is assumed to be a list of words. If a text string, it is converted to a list of words using SENTENCE→LIST. Then all the lists of words are appended to form a new list of words. If the inputs are lists of lists rather than lists of words, SENTENCE, like APPEND, does only one level of flattening, reporting a list of all the items of all the input lists.
Takes a (possibly deep) list as input, and reports a human-readable text form of the list (namely, Lisp notation).
Helper function for word/sentence library. Reports its first input, unless that input is empty, in which case it gives its second input as an error message.
Takes a text string as input, and reports the first character in the string.
block-definition.translations: pt:a primeira palavra de _ ca:primera lletra de _
